title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct market research, gather user feedback, and document functional and non-functional requirements.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for ARBankingInterface project. This includes creating a robust and scalable AR interface, defining backend services, database structure (with emphasis on normalization and optimization), and security considerations such as encryption methods and access controls. The technology stack will be defined, with an explicit focus on integration points, data flow optimization, and microservices architecture. The design aims to ensure high performance, maintainability, and scalability, while considering the importance of user experience, accessibility, and cross-platform compatibility. Upon completion, a detailed documentation including diagrams, flowcharts, and explanations will be provided for easier understanding and implementation.

title: User Interface and Experience Design
description: Design the user interface and experience for the AR banking interface, including 3D models, animations, and interaction patterns.

title: Backend Services Development
description: Develop the backend services for handling banking transactions, data processing, and integration with existing banking systems.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user data, transaction history, and other relevant information.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant banking regulations and data privacy laws.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans, create test cases, and perform thorough testing of the AR banking interface, including functional, usability, and performance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, create deployment pipelines, and automate the deployment process for the AR banking interface and its components.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the AR banking interface, including user guides, developer documentation, and support resources.
